home.title: Concrete Surgeons | Demolition, Cutting, Retrofitting
home.heroSubtitle: Since 2007, delivering expert concrete solutions across Egypt and the Gulf.
home.aboutDescription: Concrete Surgeons is the region’s leading specialist contractor in demolition, concrete cutting, and structural retrofitting — committed to safety and precision since 2007.
home.servicesSubtitle: Safe, precise, and expertly delivered demolition, cutting, and retrofitting solutions.

demolition.title: Demolition
demolition.description: From full-scale dismantling to selective strip-outs, we provide safe, engineered demolition using cutting-edge equipment.

cutting.title: Concrete Cutting & Modification
cutting.description: Clean, non-destructive cuts through slabs, walls, and beams — ideal for mechanical openings and structural separations.

about.title: About Us
about.introText: Concrete Surgeons (CS) is the Middle East’s leading specialist in safety demolition, concrete cutting, and structural retrofitting. Since 2007, we've delivered precision solutions across Egypt and the Gulf, evolving into a trusted name in complex structural modification. Backed by over 15 years of experience, we support some of the region’s most challenging redevelopment and infrastructure projects.
about.reason2: Pioneers in high-reach and controlled demolition
about.commitmentText: Every CS project is executed with surgical precision — safe, clean, and technically sound — driven by expert teams and cutting-edge equipment. Our reputation is built on trust, performance, and a relentless drive for engineering excellence.

demolition.title: Demolition Services
demolition.subtitle: Safe. Controlled. Engineered for precision.
demolition.safetyDesc: We offer safety-first demolition tailored to each site. Whether full-scale dismantling or selective interior strip-outs, our methods prioritize structural control and minimal disruption in live environments.
safetyList: Real-time monitoring and full code compliance
demolition.toolsDesc: Our specialized machinery enables top-down dismantling in the tightest environments — hospitals, towers, urban zones and more.
equipmentList: Ideal for towers, silos, high-rises, and dense zones
whyList: 15+ years of experience in safety demolition
Trusted by major projects across the Middle East
toolsExtra: Zero-vibration dismantling for hospitals and sensitive areas
Remote-operated arms ensure worker safety at heights
demolition.toolsNote: Minimal disruption in dense urban and live infrastructure zones.

cutting.title: Concrete Cutting & Structural Modification
cutting.subtitle: Precision cutting and modification for structural integrity and advanced engineering solutions.

services.title: Structural Modifications for Changing Building Use
services.desc: Includes comprehensive construction interventions such as reinforcement, redistribution, demolition, and excavation to adapt structures for new usage purposes. Suitable for space expansion, reshaping, or full structural reconfiguration in compliance with safety standards.

services.title: Restoration of Old Buildings
services.desc: Restoration of deteriorated buildings by removing damaged concrete and corroded steel, replacing it with new reinforcement, applying anti-corrosion coatings, and recasting using specialized high-strength repair materials.

services.title: Crack & Cavity Repair
services.desc: Cracks are treated using epoxy or resin injection techniques based on crack width and structure condition. Cavities are detected using non-destructive testing methods and filled with epoxy grout or high-strength concrete to restore structural integrity.

services.title: Concrete Section Enlargement
services.desc: Enlargement of structural elements such as columns, beams, and slabs by extending reinforcement, applying bonding agents, and casting new reinforced concrete.

services.title: Shotcrete Application
services.desc: Shotcrete is applied under high pressure to cover surfaces, fill voids, and repair damaged areas. Offers strong adhesion, low permeability, and long-lasting reinforcement.

services.title: Carbon Fiber Reinforced Polymer (CFRP) Strengthening
services.desc: CFRP sheets and laminates strengthen concrete components with high tensile resistance. Lightweight and flexible, ideal for slabs, beams, and columns.

services.title: Strengthening by Steel Plates and Angles
services.desc: Steel plates and angles reinforce concrete sections, increasing rigidity and durability, especially in retrofitting and repair projects.

services.title: Anchor Bolt Supply & Installation
services.desc: High-performance anchor bolts secure equipment and structural elements, offering excellent pull-out resistance and long-term stability.

services.title: Steel Rebar Anchoring in Concrete
services.desc: Advanced rebar anchoring systems embed steel into existing concrete using drilling, cleaning, and bonding for new reinforcement.

services.title: Concrete Demolition
services.desc: Manual demolition uses hammers and chisels for precise removal. Mechanical demolition uses electric jackhammers for heavy or deep demolition.

services.title: Concrete Drilling
services.desc: Diamond Core Drilling allows holes up to 1 meter, ideal for pass-throughs and testing. Hammer drilling is used for smaller anchor holes and conduit routing.

services.title: Concrete Cutting Services
services.desc: Blade Saw Cutting handles walls/floors up to 50 cm thick. Diamond Wire Saw Cutting cuts reinforced concrete of any thickness or shape.

cutting.projectDesc: Our concrete cutting expertise was utilized at Damietta Port for large-scale structural modifications, precision cutting of reinforced concrete, and high-strength anchoring — ensuring safe operations within an active marine environment.
cutting.videoTitle: Watch Damietta Port Concrete Cutting in Action
